summary: I have gotten so terrible with tumblr presence but I really needed the break to completely shift things around and I think there...
body:
I have gotten so terrible with tumblr presence but I really needed the break to completely shift things around and I think there is a whole renovation coming for this blog once the new year starts.

So many of my fandoms have so violently shifted away from me, mostly visible in me still liking the MCU but not being able to see myself writing for it again anytime soon.

If you’re still somehow following me, then you’ve seen that I have posted a lot of Game of Thrones fics already and that will proceed in the new year again. Furthermore I have found my way back to the Harry Potter fandom which was the first fandom I have ever written something for and actually found the guts to post that on the internet, and I have made that project my first ever Nano participation this year so if you’re interested in that that will be posted in the new year as well.

Beyond that I have viciously refallen in love with Black Sails and pirates, if you don’t know that show, please check it out, it is freaking good and unfortunately had to end way too early. Anyway, there will be pirate stuff coming as well.

tags: that was supposed to be the black lake right?
i never really thought about it before but
summary: Watching Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire and the Durmstangs just arrived and I had a thought. Their ship rose up out of the...
body: Watching Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire and the Durmstangs just arrived and I had a thought. Their ship rose up out of the Black Lake, right? But it’s a lake? It’s not like a river leading into an ocean or anything. It’s an enclosed body of water. So where the fuck did they come from? Did they get there a day early and hide the ship under the surface just so they could make that dramatic entrance???

summary: ¡Hemos vuelto! Hicimos este diseño cuando salió la primera peli de Animales Fantásticos.  Y para celebrar que tanto ellos como...
caption:
¡Hemos vuelto!

Hicimos este diseño cuando salió la primera peli de Animales Fantásticos.

Y para celebrar que tanto ellos como nosotros hemos vuelto, hemos rediseñado un poco a Scharmander y ahora está disponible en Pampling para que lo votéis y si es elegido poder llevaroslo en camiseta.

https://www.pampling.com/disenos/61880-Newt-Scharmander

Así que si os preocupáis por nuestro futuro y el de nuestros churumbeles, votad como si no hubiera mañana.

summary:
Harry: This is bullshit, vampires don't shine like that in the sunlight
Draco: They do! I met one that did it
Harry:...
body:
Harry: This is bullshit, vampires don't shine like that in the sunlight
Draco: They do! I met one that did it
Harry: Seriously?
Draco: Well, only for a moment, then he became ashes. But he shone!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.title: Look At You! You Are Doing Great Today!

summary: Why did Harry, Hermione and Ron have to get on the chess pieces? Why could t they just stand by the side and yell instructions?...
body:
Why did Harry, Hermione and Ron have to get on the chess pieces? Why could t they just stand by the side and yell instructions? It’s not like they were moving the pieces themselves. The pieces were already moving without them.

Wizards are bloody useless.

reblog.comment:
Why did Harry, Hermione and Ron have to get on the chess pieces? Why could t they just stand by the side and yell instructions? It’s not like they were moving the pieces themselves. The pieces were already moving without them.

Wizards are bloody useless.

summary:
BLOOD IN THE WATER

 ‘Just as the human mind cannot comprehend time, so it cannot comprehend the damage that will ensue if we...
caption:
BLOOD IN THE WATER

‘Just as the human mind cannot comprehend time, so it cannot comprehend the damage that will ensue if we presume to tamper with its laws.’ 
- Professor Saul Croaker, Department of Mysteries

Blood in the Water is an upcoming Harry Potter Era Clash roleplay on Jcink servers. We will feature an extensive canon list, site lore derived from Potter canon as well as our own creations, and a welcoming and inclusive environment for all players. We are set in the year 2033, focusing on a clash between the Grindelwald, Marauders, Potter, and Post Potter generations. 

The Time Turner Crash of 2033 affected the three other timelines at their respective heights. Dumbledore hasn’t fought Grindelwald. Tom Riddle hasn’t gone after the Potters. And by tampering with time, the Tempus agents within the Ministry of Magic have effectively rewritten history and given it a chance to start over in 2033. It’s a time of political and economic crisis, with evil that has been defeated once before now back and stronger than ever. What will you do when the sharks smell the blood in the water? 

SITE BUZZ TUMBLR. ASKBOX. SITE TAG.

🥀A smile can hide a million things 🥀

🌸

summary:
Since there’s five people to a dorm at Hogwarts I wonder who was the fifth person with the Marauders? 
Did they enjoy it? Were...
body:
Since there’s five people to a dorm at Hogwarts I wonder who was the fifth person with the Marauders?

Did they enjoy it? Were they sick of the pranks? Or was thier fifth dorm mate constantly changing people? Because I can imagine someone being like “Fuck yeah! Bobby wants to switch dorms! It’s my turn to hang out with Potter, Black, Lupin, and Pettigrew!” Only to figure out why their fifth dorm mate is always changing. Like they were always sick of either; James constantly talking about Lily, Sirius blasting his ‘edgy’ muggle music, Peter’s horrible snoring, or just occasionally waking up in the middle of the night to see Remus yelling at a stag, giant dog, and a rat.

The first day they enter the dorm is like:

Did they enjoy it? Were they sick of the pranks? Or was thier fifth dorm mate constantly changing people? Because I can imagine someone being like “Fuck yeah! Bobby wants to switch dorms! It’s my turn to hang out with Potter, Black, Lupin, and Pettigrew!” Only to figure out why their fifth dorm mate is always changing. Like they were always sick of either; James constantly talking about Lily, Sirius blasting his ‘edgy’ muggle music, Peter’s horrible snoring, or just occasionally waking up in the middle of the night to see Remus yelling at a stag, giant dog, and a rat.

The first day they enter the dorm is like:

tags: BUT THEN WASN'T HIS DAD IN JAIL???? CONJUGAL VISITS??????
summary: Listen. That baby chick came on the screen and I thought ‘wow! that looks like a baby phoenix! that can’t be right!’ And then a...
body:
Listen.

That baby chick came on the screen and I thought

‘wow! that looks like a baby phoenix! that can’t be right!’

And then a short while later, I made the connection

And I sat there staring at the screen in some warped sense of confusion for 99% of the rest of the movie until what I thought was true was revealed to be true and btw I lied about the 99% I’m still so fucking confused someone help me

also the ad before the movie said ‘don’t be a Hufflepuff’ and i was greatly offended while sitting there in my Hufflepuff shirt and hat like, fuck you, man Badger Pride!

blog.name: nonbinarytranspumpkin
blog.title: Apologetic Night Owl
blog.description:
Please call me Alex
Nonbinary trans (ftm)
Was previously known as, "She Smiled"

summary: Say this once
body:
Say this once

IF YOU CAN’T PUT REPRESENTATION IN YOUR STORIES BECAUSE YOUR SCARED OF CONTROVERSY, THEN DON’T ADD IT AFTER THE FACT TO STAY RELEVANT! HARRY POTTER WOULD REMAIN RELEVANT WITHOUT JK ROWLING SPEWING OUT SHIT AFTER THE FACT TO KEEP UP WITH THE CHANGE OF CLIMATE BETWEEN HER TARGETED GENERATION AND THE CURRENT! VOLTRON COULD HAVE ADDED GAY REPRESENTATION FOR SHIRO BY GIVING HIM A SHOT WITH ANOTHER GUY AFTER THE DEATH OF ADAM, BUT INSTEAD THEY CHOSE TO WAIT UNTIL AFTER THEY REVEALED THEIR FORMER RELATIONSHIP AND KILLED OFF ADAM TO TELL US THAT SHIRO WAS GAY! DISNEY PRINCESSES (except Mulan, who was a legendary warrior in China, Jasmine, and Ariel) CAN BE ANY VARIANT OF POC SEEING AS THEY ALL HAVE STORIES FROM DIFFERENT GROUPS OF CULTURES! CINDERELLA CAN BE MUSLIM, SNOW WHITE COULD BE AFRICAN AMERICAN, SLEEPING BEAUTY CAN BE NATIVE AMERICAN, BELLE CAN BE INDIAN, AND SO ON! REPRESENTATION IS IMPORTANT! IF IT CAUSES CONTROVERSY, GOOD. THEN PEOPLE WILL START LISTENING AND LEARNING FOR ONCE!

Seriously, the only people who seemed willing to risk their careers over and over again are people like Rick Riordan, a large percentage of comic companies, Brooklyn 99, and half of the British Television we watch. Respect, Represent, and Repeat, the three rules of presenting a proper series to those that are gay, POC, and so on.

summary: Went and saw the new Fantastic Beasts movie with my mom. I wasn't super impressed. The graphics were great and Eddie Redmayne...
body:
Went and saw the new Fantastic Beasts movie with my mom. I wasn’t super impressed. The graphics were great and Eddie Redmayne was amazing (as per usual).

But what the fuck was up with the story line? Nagini used to be human? Ewww. Queenie went dark side? Wtf! Dumbledore suddenly has a brother we’ve never heard of? Possible, but unlikely.

When exactly in the Dumbledore family history did the ship sinking take place? Is this before his dad went to jail?

And my BIG question. Why the fuck was Dumbledore’s baby brother on that ship in the first goddamned place?
